Package com.irurueta.reactorworkshop.arithmeticsequence.api.controllers

Class ArithmeticSequenceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.reactorworkshop.arithmeticsequence.api.controllers.ArithmeticSequenceController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/arithmetic-sequence")
public class ArithmeticSequenceController
extends Object
    REST controller in charge of computing arithmetic sequences.

                                    MultipleArithmeticSequenceDetailDtoFactory detailFactory,
                                    MultipleArithmeticSequenceSummaryDtoFactory summaryFactory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        nonReactiveService - Service to non-reactively execute arithmetic sequence computation.
        reactiveService - Service to reactively execute arithmetic sequence computation.
        validationService - Service to validate provided input parameters.
        dataMapper - Maps request parameters into domain entities.
        resultMapper - Maps result to API DTO's.
        detailFactory - Creates DTO's for detailed results.
        summaryFactory - Creates DTO's for summary results.

    • Method Detail

      • computeDetailNonReactive

        @GetMapping("/non-reactive/detail")
public MultipleArithmeticSequenceDetailDto computeDetailNonReactive​(@RequestParam("minValue")
                                                                    int minValue,
                                                                    @RequestParam("step")
                                                                    int step,
                                                                    @RequestParam("count")
                                                                    int count,
                                                                    @RequestParam("sequenceMethod")
                                                                    String sequenceMethod)
        Non-reactively computes detailed results of arithmetic sequences.
        Parameters:
        minValue - minimum value where arithmetic sequences will start.
        step - step between values in computed arithmetic sequences.
        count - number of arithmetic sequences to be computed (containing elements from 0 up to count).
        sequenceMethod - method used for arithmetic sequence computation. Can be either "exhaustive" or "fast".
        Returns:
        requested detailed results of arithmetic sequences.

      • computeSummaryNonReactive

        @GetMapping("/non-reactive/summary")
public MultipleArithmeticSequenceSummaryDto computeSummaryNonReactive​(@RequestParam("minValue")
                                                                      int minValue,
                                                                      @RequestParam("step")
                                                                      int step,
                                                                      @RequestParam("count")
                                                                      int count,
                                                                      @RequestParam("sequenceMethod")
                                                                      String sequenceMethod)
        Non-reactively computes summary results of arithmetic sequences. Summary only contains total arithmetic sequences computed and their total sum, but does not contain their detailed results.
        Parameters:
        minValue - minimum value where arithmetic sequences will start.
        step - step between values in computed arithmetic sequences.
        count - number of arithmetic sequences to be computed (containing elements from 0 up to count).
        sequenceMethod - method used for arithmetic sequence computation. Can be either "exhaustive" or "fast".
        Returns:
        requested summary results of arithmetic sequences.

      • computeDetailReactive

        @GetMapping("/reactive/detail")
public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MultipleArithmeticSequenceDetailDto> computeDetailReactive​(@RequestParam("minValue")
                                                                                              int minValue,
                                                                                              @RequestParam("step")
                                                                                              int step,
                                                                                              @RequestParam("count")
                                                                                              int count,
                                                                                              @RequestParam("sequenceMethod")
                                                                                              String sequenceMethod)
        Reactively computes detailed results of arithmetic sequences.
        Parameters:
        minValue - minimum value where arithmetic sequences will start.
        step - step between values in computed arithmetic sequences.
        count - number of arithmetic sequences to be computed (containing elements from 0 up to count).
        sequenceMethod - method used for arithmetic sequence computation. Can be either "exhaustive" or "fast".
        Returns:
        requested detailed results of arithmetic sequences.

      • computeSummaryReactive

        @GetMapping("/reactive/summary")
public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MultipleArithmeticSequenceSummaryDto> computeSummaryReactive​(@RequestParam("minValue")
                                                                                                int minValue,
                                                                                                @RequestParam("step")
                                                                                                int step,
                                                                                                @RequestParam("count")
                                                                                                int count,
                                                                                                @RequestParam("sequenceMethod")
                                                                                                String sequenceMethod)
        Reactively computes summary results of arithmetic sequences. Summary only contains total arithmetic sequences computed and their total sum, but does not contain their detailed results. Because this implementation is fully reactive, memory usage will remain constantly low regardless of the number of requested arithmetic sequences to be computed.
        Parameters:
        minValue - minimum value where arithmetic sequences will start.
        step - step between values in computed arithmetic sequences.
        count - number of arithmetic sequences to be computed (containing elements from 0 up to count).
        sequenceMethod - method used for arithmetic sequence computation. Can be either "exhaustive" or "fast".
        Returns:
        requested summary results of arithmetic sequences.
